text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Okay, that's it for this forum! We're making a huge progress!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: But are you really fine with this? I mean, I almost ran you over, and now you're helping me.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh, how kind you are! If I had ran to you, 
I would have put a hole on you, instead of the wall!

Afterwards, I received a polite apology from Kawakami Princess 
for almost bumping into me.

I apologized as well, since I wasn't paying attention, and 
decided to help her with the chores――

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, the training center is a very big place. It's tiring to go 
around every single location even for a princess like me.

I have been wondering about this for a while now. 
What exactly is this "princess" she calls herself?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh, couldn't you tell? Yes, I am a princess. In other words 
I'm a Princess Fighter!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Bakusou Mougi☆Princess Fighter! You must have seen it 
before right, trainer?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
She is a princess, but she is the strongest warrior 
who fights in a fair race against the Dark Uma Musume 
born from darkness.…… That's Princess Fighter!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Princess Fighter's strong heart is supported by the Prince's 
- "legendary trainer's" strong love.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I always wanted to be a princess since I was 
a child. But everyone around me told me that 
a violent person cannot become a princess……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I was depressed, thinking "maybe I can't become one"…… But then, Princess Fighter taught me something.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: "As a princess! Be gorgeous, be graceful, be brave!"

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Even a tomboy can be a princess! I came to Tracen Academy to 
become a strong and brave princess like Princess Fighter!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Oh my…… why such a confused face……?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, you're not gonna say that my ideals are too high are 
you? 
Those words are just nonsense!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Dreams are something you decide for yourself, and you 
have to reach them by yourself, right?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
What does it matter if my goal is high or not! I will become a 
princess like Princess Fighter!

I am impressed with her straight forward attitude. With this 
conviction, I'm sure she's going to be strong―

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Oh? What a coincidence, Kawakami-san.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Hyaa! Ki, Ki-Ki-Ki, King-san? It's been a while, b-but, 
Good Morning madam!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hey…… I've never heard that kind of greeting before. 
Oh well. What are you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh, this is…… it's not what it looks like, Air Groove-san from 
the student council told me to… uhmm…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh, how nice of you to be willing 
to help out with student council!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huh……?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If you're going to be first class, you have 
to behave accordingly. Hidden devotion is one 
of them.…… Fufufu, that's a good mindset.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Well, if you need help, I'm sure the King here would be happy 
to help―

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Nooooooo, no, no, no, no, no! 
It's something I must do myself!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Yeah? Then I'll get going. I'll be…… cheering you on.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
She's beautiful! She's perfect! Did you see that? 
The way she carries herself!
choice_data_list:
(The same eyes when she talked about 
Princess Fighter……!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I've been thinking lately. I think that King-san is the closest to 
Princess Fighter Uma Musume in this world……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Because, because, she's so perfect! 
Beautiful…… elegant…… and graceful……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! - Oh, my God! Ever since I first came to this 
school and saw King-san, I've been looking up to her!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
King-san is always so noble and imposing, and her 
mannerisms are so, you know…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes! That's it! Elegance! After all, a princess, needs to be 
elegant!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
That King-san complimented me…… I can't stand still like this! 
I'm going to finish the job all by myself!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Bye! Have a nice day!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Haa…… Haa……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(I got a compliment! I got a compliment from 
King-san! We're almost to the Selection Race, 
and at this rate, as a princess, I'll also――!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(As a princess - like King-san…… oh? But compared to 
King-san I'm much…… no, much less?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami's Mother
text_block_list.text:
See? The princess in this book is gentle and quiet, right? If you 
want to be a princess, you have to be a good, quiet girl.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(Oh no, what did my mother mean by this? If I can't be like 
King-san, does that mean I can't become a princess!?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: This may not be the way to go～!
